column1: https://chatgpt.com/share/69765a8d-0344-8007-9de5-0a756db332d4

provide listing of churches, synagogues, temples and other religious organizations providing immigrant services and sanctuary in the minneapolis-St.Paul Metro. Focus on Ramsey, Hennepin, Dakota, Scott and Washington Counties. Column names are church/religious organization, county, address, URL, facebook page, phone #, immigrant services offered, volunteers needed (Y/N/?), county. Sort by county, then by organization. export to excel.
Church/Religious Organization
column7: Immigrant Services Offered

column1: International Friendship Center (IFC Twin Cities) – Burnsville (Ascension Lutheran site)
column7: Free classes (e.g., English and citizenship) and community friendship/support hosted at Ascension Lutheran (Burnsville site).

column1: La Viña Burnsville (Christian church) – Free Food Distribution
column7: Free food pantry/distribution and community assistance (bilingual, community-facing outreach).

column1: La Viña Inver Iglesia Cristiana – Pan y Peces (Food distribution)
column3: 6070 Cahill Ave, Inver Grove Heights, MN 55076
column7: Pan y Peces outreach: free food distribution; community support.

column1: Lutheran Church of the Ascension (Burnsville) – Hosts IFC classes
column7: Hosts International Friendship Center classes and community support activities for immigrants/refugees at church site.

column1: Al-Maa'uun (Neighborly Needs) – Masjid An-Nur
column7: Food shelf/Neighborly Needs; community support (food and basic needs), housed in Masjid An-Nur.

column1: Arrive Ministries
column7: Refugee resettlement and essential services; practical assistance for refugees/immigrants; volunteers partnered with local churches.

column1: Church of the Incarnation – Sagrado Corazón de Jesús (Catholic)
column7: Hosts Mass and an immigration legal clinic (immigration counseling/assistance).

column1: Holy Trinity Lutheran Church (ELCA) – AMMPARO / Sanctuary-supporting
column7: AMMPARO accompaniment for migrant minors (legal appointments, basic needs); declared Sanctuary Supporting congregation providing support to congregations holding immigrants in sanctuary.

column1: ICOM (Minnesota Interfaith Coalition on Immigration)
column7: AID line and support/resources for asylees/immigrants/detainees; vigils & courtwatch; advocacy.

column1: Masjid An-Nur (Islamic Centers of Minneapolis & St. Paul)
column7: Community support and resources; hosts Al‑Maa’uun food shelf and related community assistance.

column1: Minnesota Council of Churches – Refugee Services
column3: 122 W Franklin Ave, Ste 100, Minneapolis, MN 55404
column7: Refugee services and immigration legal services (including walk‑in hours); resettlement support.

column1: Park Avenue Church Minneapolis (United Methodist) – Walk-In Legal Clinic
column7: Park Avenue Legal Clinic (VLN): immigration and other legal issues; staffed by volunteer attorneys (appointments assigned based on capacity).

column1: Shir Tikvah MN Congregation (Reform Jewish) – Sanctuary & Immigrant Justice
column7: Sanctuary/supporting congregation; provided material, financial, and volunteer support and housed a family at risk of deportation.

column1: St. Paul's–San Pablo Lutheran Church (ELCA, bilingual)
column7: Migrant ministry and expanded humanitarian, financial, legal, and pastoral support; free well‑being sessions for migrant families.

column1: Temple Israel (Reform Jewish) – Immigrant Support Resources
column7: Immigrant support resources and Immigration Justice Fund to help support families with financial assistance.

column1: Immigrant Connection Mosaic (at Mosaic Christian Community)
column3: 540 E Wheelock Pkwy, St Paul, MN 55130
column7: Low-cost immigration legal services (in development/operations) plus resources including conversational English/ESL and citizenship/civics classes.

column1: Mosaic Christian Community (Resource Center)
column3: 540 E Wheelock Pkwy, St Paul, MN 55130
column7: Hosts Immigrant Connection Mosaic; provides ESL/conversational English and citizenship classes plus other resources for immigrant neighbors.

column1: New Life Presbyterian Church (Roseville) – Sanctuary
column7: Sanctuary congregation (space of refuge for immigrant individuals/families at immediate risk of deportation) and related support via sanctuary network.

column1: St. Mary of the Lake Catholic Church – Refugee Ministry (White Bear Lake)
column3: 4741 Bald Eagle Ave, White Bear Lake, MN 55110
column7: Refugee ministry/resettlement support (parish initiatives and volunteer opportunities).

column1: St. Thomas More Catholic Church (Jesuit) – Immigrant Support Ministry / Sanctuary
column7: Immigrant support ministry (education/action/advocacy); coordinates and supports sanctuary and asylum program; refugee mentor program.

column1: Holy Cross Lutheran Church (Prior Lake) – English Classes
column3: 14085 Pike Lake Trail NE, Prior Lake, MN 55372
column7: English classes aimed at helping immigrants and refugees learn English and connect to community.

column1: All Saints Lutheran Church, ELCA (Cottage Grove) – Immigration Task Force
column7: Immigration Task Force (community education/support; hosts immigrant-related events such as Know Your Rights presentations).

column1: Five Oaks Church (Woodbury) – Loving the Immigrant
column7: Immigrant-focused outreach and connections to partner organizations supporting immigrant neighbors.

column1: Guardian Angels Catholic Church (Oakdale) – Refugee/Outreach Ministries
column7: Justice & Outreach ministries; refugee resettlement support initiatives (parish engagement/volunteering).
